00030 int tmcl_init_motor(TMCLMotor **mot, TMCLInterface *iface, TMCLModel model,
00031                     uint8_t address, uint8_t bank, TMCLBusType bus) {
00032 
00033     DEBUG("tmcl_init_motor() address: %d, bank: %d\n", address, bank);
00034 
00035     *mot = (TMCLMotor*)malloc(sizeof(TMCLMotor));
00036 
00037     if(mot == NULL)
00038         return -1;
00039 
00040     (*mot)->device.model        = model;
00041     (*mot)->device.address      = address;
00042     (*mot)->device.bank         = bank;
00043     (*mot)->device.bus          = bus;
00044     (*mot)->iface                       = iface;
00045     
00046     (*mot)->device.num_refswitches = 0;
00047 
00048     tmcl_init(&((*mot)->device));
00049 
00050 //    if(tmcl_get_all_axis_parameter(*mot) < 0)
00051 //        return -1;
00052 
00053     return 0;
00054 
00055 }
00056 
00057 void tmcl_deinit_motor(TMCLMotor **mot) {
00058 
00059     (*mot)->device.address = 0;
00060     (*mot)->device.bank         = 0;
00061     (*mot)->device.bus  = TMCL_NONE;
00062     (*mot)->iface               = NULL;
00063 
00064     tmcl_deinit(&((*mot)->device));
00065 
00066     free(*mot);
00067 }
00068 
00069 int tmcl_send_command(TMCLMotor *mot, TMCLCommand tcom, TMCLReply *reply) {
00070 
00071     uint8_t datagram[TMCL_MAX_DGRAM_SIZE];
00072     int length = 0;
00073     int ret = 0;
00074     TMCLReply tmp_reply;
00075     char reply_buf[TMCL_MAX_DGRAM_SIZE];
00076     int reply_length = 0;
00077 
00078     struct timespec timewait; /* How long to wait for reading after write() */
00079     /* Inititalize the timewait structure */
00080     timewait.tv_sec  = mot->iface->timewait_sec;
00081     timewait.tv_nsec = mot->iface->timewait_msec * 1e6;
00082 
00083 
00084     length = tmcl_datagram(datagram, mot->device, tcom.command, tcom.type, tcom.value);
00085 
00086     DEBUG("writing datagram 0x%02X,%02X,%02X,%02X,%02X,%02X,%02X,%02X,%02X of length %d\n",\
00087           datagram[0], datagram[1], datagram[2], datagram[3], datagram[4], datagram[5],\
00088           datagram[6], datagram[7], datagram[8], length);
00089 
00090     if( mot->iface->_write(mot->iface, datagram, length, mot->iface->tmcl_write_void) ==  -1) { /* An error ocurred */
00091         DEBUG("Error in write\n");
00092         return -1;
00093     }
00094 
00095     /* Give the board some time to fill the input buffer */
00096 
00097     if(nanosleep(&timewait, NULL) == -1) {
00098         perror("nanosleep");
00099     }
00100     
00101     /* Every command sends a reply. You shouldn't send another command before the
00102      * reply is received */
00103     reply_length = mot->iface->_read(mot->iface, reply_buf, mot->iface->tmcl_read_void);
00104     if(reply_length == -2) {
00105         DEBUG("Reading failed.\n");
00106         /* TODO: explain this hack */
00107         DEBUG("HACK: Trying to poll again.\n");
00108         reply_length = mot->iface->_read(mot->iface, reply_buf, mot->iface->tmcl_read_void);
00109         if(  reply_length < 0 ) { /* This is a hack */
00110             DEBUG("Reading failed again.\n");
00111             return -1;
00112         }
00113     }
00114 
00115     /* Convert answer to a TMCL reply */
00116     ret = tmcl_dgram2reply(&tmp_reply, (uint8_t*)reply_buf, reply_length);
00117 
00118     if(ret != 0)
00119         return -2;
00120 
00121     if(tmp_reply.status != TMCL_STATUS_SUCCESS) {
00122         ret = -3;
00123         DEBUG("TMCL reply != STATUS_SUCCESS\n");
00124     }
00125 
00126 
00127     if(reply != NULL) {
00128         memcpy(reply, &tmp_reply, sizeof(TMCLReply));
00129         DEBUG("REPLY:\n");
00130         DEBUG("module address: %d\n", reply->module_address);
00131         DEBUG("status: %d\n", reply->status);
00132         DEBUG("command: %d\n", reply->command);
00133         DEBUG("value: %d\n", reply->value);
00134         DEBUG("tmcl_dram2reply() END\n");
00135     }
00136     DEBUG("send_command returning %d\n", ret);
00137 
00138     return ret;
00139 }
00140 
00141 int tmcl_update_axis_parameter(TMCLMotor *mot, int tmcl_parameter) {
00142 
00143     TMCLReply reply;
00144     TMCLCommand command;
00145 
00146     command.command = TMCL_GAP;
00147     command.type = tmcl_parameter;
00148 
00149     if((tmcl_parameter > TMCL_MAX_PAR_NO) || (tmcl_parameter < 0 )) {
00150         DEBUG("Invalid TMCL Parameter: %d\n", tmcl_parameter);
00151         return -1;
00152     }
00153 
00154     DEBUG("Getting axis parameter %d\n", tmcl_parameter);
00155 
00156     if(tmcl_send_command(mot, command, &reply) < 0) {
00157         DEBUG(("send_command failed.\n"));
00158         return -1;
00159     }
00160 
00161     DEBUG("Axis parameter %d has value %d\n", tmcl_parameter, reply.value);
00162 
00163     /* These assert should not fail. Because then tmcl_send_command should have returned -1 */
00164     assert(reply.status == TMCL_STATUS_SUCCESS);
00165     assert(reply.command == TMCL_GAP);
00166 
00167     mot->device.parameter[tmcl_parameter] = reply.value;
00168 
00169     return 0;
00170 
00171 }
00172 
00173 int tmcl_get_axis_parameter(TMCLMotor *mot, int axis_parameter) {
00174         
00175 
00176     if(tmcl_update_axis_parameter(mot, axis_parameter) < 0) {
00177         DEBUG("getting axis parameter failed %d failed\n", axis_parameter);
00178         return -1;
00179     }
00180 
00181     return mot->device.parameter[axis_parameter];
00182 }
00183 
00184 int tmcl_set_axis_parameter(TMCLMotor *mot, int axis_parameter, int value) {
00185 
00186     TMCLReply reply;
00187     TMCLCommand command;
00188 
00189     command.command = TMCL_SAP;
00190     command.type = axis_parameter;
00191     command.value = value;
00192 
00193     if((axis_parameter > TMCL_MAX_PAR_NO) || (axis_parameter < 0 )) {
00194         DEBUG("Invalid axis Parameter: %d\n", axis_parameter);
00195         return -1;
00196     }
00197 
00198     if(tmcl_send_command(mot, command, &reply) < 0) {
00199         DEBUG("send_command failed.\n");
00200         return -1;
00201     }
00202 
00203     DEBUG("(set_axix_par) Axis parameter %d has value %d\n", axis_parameter, reply.value);
00204 
00205     assert(reply.status == TMCL_STATUS_SUCCESS);
00206     assert(reply.command == TMCL_SAP);
00207     mot->device.parameter[axis_parameter] = reply.value;
00208 
00209     return 0;
00210 
00211 }
00212 
00213 int tmcl_store_axis_parameter(TMCLMotor *mot, int axis_parameter) {
00214 
00215     TMCLReply reply;
00216     TMCLCommand command;
00217 
00218     command.command = TMCL_STAP;
00219     command.type = axis_parameter;
00220     command.value = 0;
00221 
00222     if((axis_parameter > TMCL_MAX_PAR_NO) || (axis_parameter < 0 )) {
00223         DEBUG("Invalid axis Parameter: %d\n", axis_parameter);
00224         return -1;
00225     }
00226 
00227     if(tmcl_send_command(mot, command, &reply) < 0) {
00228         DEBUG("send_command failed.\n");
00229         return -1;
00230     }
00231 
00232     assert(reply.status == TMCL_STATUS_SUCCESS);
00233     assert(reply.command == TMCL_STAP);
00234     mot->device.parameter[axis_parameter] = reply.value;
00235 
00236     return 0;
00237 
00238 }
